item.description:
EVENT: Join us for a wet-n-wild day of white water rafting on the Kennebec River in Maine preceded by a night of lodging.  Lodging options include the following:
1.  Campsite (BYO tent):  $10-13 per person (per night)
2.  Cabin tent (includes heavy canvas tent and 2 or 4 cots, depending):  ~$20 per person (per night)
3.  Indoor lodging in a two-level unit (for 4-6 people):  $179 per night (not per person)
4.  Cabins with 2-4 bedrooms (for larger crowds):  $259-439
**For those of you observing Shabbat:  We'd love to have you join us!  Please feel free to come up late on Saturday (after Shabbat) for the overnight.  We have to be at the river by 7:45 on Sunday morning, so driving up on Sunday is not really an option (unless you are a serious early bird!).

Trip Coordinator: Stephanie
RSVP: Please let Stephanie know by Friday, 9/14, if you plan to attend.  Reservations need to be made as soon as possible.
MEET: TBD, pending RSVPs
COST: One specially-reduced 4-pack of white water rafting ($156) has already been purchased by the club.  This will be divided equally if 4 people attend event.  For each additional attendee/purchase, the total cost for the regular rate of rafting will be combined with the discounted rate and then averaged between the total number of attendees (to help defray costs for everyone).  In addition, there is a $5 per person "river access fee" which is not included in the $156 above ($20, or 4 x $5 fees, have already been paid for by the club).  Lastly, there are the lodging fees.  Lodging reservations made under Stephanie's name will receive an extra 20% off the prices listed above.  The total lodging expense will be calculated once the RSVPs come in and the reservation is made.  Additional $5 for nonmembers, which can be credited toward a Mosaic membership costing $25.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP and Stephanie will contact you to make plans

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: White Water Rafting on the Kennebec River in Maine
